full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/2/2023 - 2 - 4. That the deponent Smt. Bhagwat Kaur wife of deponent S. Sant Singh Dua was born in the year 1922 (Neneteen hundred twenty two) at District Sargoda which was in India prior to partition and after 1947 (Neneteen hundred and fourty seven) it is now in pakistan. DEPONENTS. We, Sant Singh Dua & Smt. Bhagwat Kaur verify that the contents 371232 of paras No. 1,2,3 and 4 are true to our personal knowledge. Nothing is false and nothing has been concealed. So help us God. Verified this on 5th day of August, 1986 in Court Compound, Kanpur (U.P.) India. NOTARY DEPONENTS SERVING NARAIN SNSULA ADVOCATE NOTARY Identified Sri Sant Singh Dua CAMPUR, 8'11 and Smt. Bhagwat Kaur who have are signed before me. ( 5.8.86 K.D. Dikshit ) Cuiton Advocate Kanpur (U.P.) India. # the contente of white Kaar Customs seed our and explained and who 10) deceased by Shree K ego FOOD Depo Arneall Read the fas as Souid Marain Dau MARARY - 6/8/86.
